label.ensureNetwork: Ensure that you are connected to the network

label.confirmCancel: Are you sure you want to cancel ?

label.AU_usageString: USAGE ======= CIPCLocaleDownloader parameterName1=<parameterValue1> parameterName2=<parameterValue2> ... PARAMETERS: Must specify httpServer/tftpServer, installFolder, manifestFile Optional Parameters are mode, waitWindow and postUpdateScript Parameters are both order and case insensitive E.g. CIPCLocaleDownloader httpServer=http://www.webserver.com/Communicator installFolder="D:\Program Files\ACME Systems\ACME Studio" mode=install waitWindow="ACME Studio" postUpdateScript=Notepad.exe

label.AU_autoupdateComponentNotDefined: Error in CIPC Locale manifest file - Locale component not defined

label.AU_closeWindowTitle: Please close all windows with the following title

label.AU_endProcesses: Please end the following processes before continuing

label.AU_repairsList: The following modules contain files that are missing or have been altered

label.AU_requiredUpdatesList: The following modules have required updates

label.AU_recommendedUpdatesList: The following modules have recommended updates

label.AU_selectUpdate: Do you want to apply recommended updates to the following module?

label.AU_installAny: Would you like to install any of them ?

label.AU_wantToDoUpdates: There are some updates available Would you like to download and install them now ?

label.AU_olderVersionInstalled: Installed file has an older version

label.AU_newerVersionInstalled: Installed file has a newer version

label.AU_equalVersionInstalled: Installed file has the same version

label.AU_checksumMismatch: File checksum does not match expected value

label.AU_olderFileInstalled: Modified date of installed file is older

label.AU_newerFileInstalled: Modified date of installed file is newer

label.AU_Error_tftpHttpNotDefined: You must specify either tftpServer or httpServer

label.AU_Error_invalidUpdateMode: Invalid update mode. Allowed modes are 'install' and 'query'

label.AU_Error_unsupportedProtocol: Transfer protocol is unsupported or invalid

label.AU_Error_downloadedFileInvalid: Downloaded file does not match description

label.AU_Error_requiredUpdateFailed: Could not install required updates for the following module

label.AU_Error_recommendedUpdateFailed: Could not install recommended updates for the following module

label.AU_Error_repairFailed: Failed to update the following module

label.AU_Error_unableToChangeModifiedDate: Unable to change the date of last modification

label.AU_Error_archiveFileMismatch: File in archive does not match its description

label.AU_Error_ensureNoOtherApps: Please close all other applications and retry
